query.sql: with ash_sql as ( select case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end event_name, case when ash.wait_class is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.wait_class end wait_class, count(*) cnt from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) group by ash.event, ash.wait_class ) select :TIME_MI TIME_MI_LV2, a.*, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total from ash_sql a order by 5 desc

with ash_sql as ( select ash.sql_id, ash.user_id, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state,'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash where sql_id is not null and sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end = :EVENT_NAME group by ash.sql_id, ash.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, a.cpu, a.wait, a.io, a.total, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, u.username, a.sql_id, (select s.sql_text from v$sqlstats s where s.sql_id=a.sql_id) txt, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, :EVENT_NAME from ash_sql a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id order by 5 desc

with aggr_ash as ( select /*+ materialize */ p.object_name, p.procedure_name, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'ON CPU', 1, 0)) cpu, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', 1, 0)) - sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) wait, sum (decode (ash.session_state, 'WAITING', decode (ash.wait_class, 'User I/O', 1, 0), 0)) io, count(*) total, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load, max (ash.sample_time) last_executed from v$active_session_history ash, dba_procedures p where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and ash.plsql_entry_object_id is not null and ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id is not null and p.object_id = ash.plsql_entry_object_id and p.subprogram_id=ash.plsql_entry_subprogram_id and case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end = :EVENT_NAME group by p.object_name, p.procedure_name ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(TOTAL) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.*, :EVENT_NAME from aggr_ash a order by 2 desc

with ash_sql as ( select a.session_id, a.session_serial#, a.program, a.module, a.action, a.machine, u.username, a.cnt, a.waiting, a.in_parse, a.in_hard_parse, a.in_sql_execution, a.in_plsql_execution, a.in_plsql_compilation, a.in_java_execution, a.in_bind, a.in_cursor_close, a.in_sequence_load, a.sql_id from ( select session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id, count(*) cnt, sum(case when session_state = 'WAITING' then 1 else 0 end) waiting, sum(case when in_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_parse, sum(case when in_hard_parse = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_hard_parse, sum(case when in_sql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_execution, sum(case when in_plsql_compilation = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_plsql_compilation, sum(case when in_java_execution = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_java_execution, sum(case when in_bind = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_bind, sum(case when in_cursor_close = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_cursor_close, sum(case when in_sequence_load = 'Y' then 1 else 0 end) in_sequence_load from v$active_session_history ash where ash.sample_time >= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) - 30 / (24 * 60 * 60) and ash.sample_time <= nvl(to_date(:TIME_MI_LV2, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), sysdate) and case when ash.event is null then 'ON_CPU' else ash.event end = :EVENT_NAME group by session_id, session_serial#, program, module, action, machine, user_id, sql_id ) a, dba_users u where a.user_id=u.user_id ) select :TIME_MI_LV2, round(ratio_to_report(CNT) over()*100, 2) proc_total, a.*, :EVENT_NAME from ash_sql a order by 2 desc
